code-vb.init:
Settings("MyTokensReplace") = False
If CType(Settings("TEXTHTML_ReplaceTokens"), String) <> "" Then If CType(Settings("TEXTHTML_ReplaceTokens"), Boolean) = True Then Settings("MyTokensReplace") = True End If End If
If CType(Settings("HtmlText_ReplaceTokens"), String) <> "" Then If CType(Settings("HtmlText_ReplaceTokens"), Boolean) = True Then Settings("MyTokensReplace") = True End If End If
' Prevent Standard Token Replacement Settings("TEXTHTML_ReplaceTokens") = False Settings("HtmlText_ReplaceTokens") = False
code-vb.pre-render: If CType(Settings("MyTokensReplace"), Boolean) = True Then DirectCast(lblContent.Controls(0), LiteralControl).Text = Tokenize(DirectCast(lblContent.Controls(0), LiteralControl).Text, ModuleConfiguration, False, True) End If
